TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NonFileNameRouteConstraint extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IParameterPolicy, class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteConstraint
type NonFileNameRouteConstraint = class interface IParameterPolicy interface IRouteConstraint
type NonFileNameRouteConstraint = class interface IRouteConstraint interface IParameterPolicy

Docs.summary: Constrains a route parameter to represent only non-file-name values. Does not validate that the route value contains valid file system characters, or that the value represents an actual file on disk.

remarks.para: This constraint can be used to disambiguate requests for dynamic content versus static files served from the application.

This constraint determines whether a route value represents a file name by examining the last URL Path segment of the value (delimited by /). The last segment must contain the dot (.) character followed by one or more non-(.) characters.
If the route value does not contain a / then the entire value will be interpreted as a the last segment.
The does not attempt to validate that the value contains a legal file name for the current operating system.

listheader.term: Examples of route values that will be matched as non-file-names

item.description: Final segment does not contain a ..
Final segment does not contain a ..

listheader.term: Examples of route values that will be rejected as file names

item.description: Final segment contains a . followed by other characters.
Final segment contains a . followed by other characters.
Final segment contains a . followed by other characters.
Final segment contains a . followed by other characters.
